Future events: I would want to see future events that are yet to occur, such as major sports events, political elections, or natural disasters. This would allow me to prepare for these events and make informed decisions.
Future careers: I would want to see the future of different careers and the skills that will be in demand. This would help me to choose a career that will be relevant and in demand in the future.

Future travel destinations: I would want to see the future of travel and the destinations that will be popular in the future. This would allow me to plan my travels and visit places that I would not have known about otherwise.
Future fashion trends: I would want to see the future of fashion and the trends that will be popular. This would help me to stay ahead of the fashion curve and dress accordingly.

Future health and wellness trends: I would want to see the future of health and wellness and the trends that will be popular. This would help me to stay healthy and make informed decisions about my health.
